name: Children of Morn
storyline: You are resurrected by a white-haired witch that offers you a deal. Her blood to keep you alive, in return for helping her with an important mission. A mission to murder her very own sister. Soon you are plunged into a world full of magic and mystery, learn that there is more to it all than meets the eye and that receiving “her blood” means sharing the witches bed.
summary: Children of Morn is an erotic adventure and sandbox game set in a dark fantasy world full of vicious demons and alluring witches.
